item.title: Unbearably bright street lamp, 25th July
item.description:
New street lights were installed some time ago but in recent months/ year on Frogley Road outside houses number 1 and 2. These shine directly into first floor bedrooms making it impossible to sleep without blackout blinds, which are expensive to install in Victorian sash windows as are required on our road. Please can you shade the street lamp as I have seen you doing elsewhere so it doesnâ€™t shine into the bedrooms of 1 and 2 Frogley Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frogley Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic diversion makes it impossible to leave parking space, 25th July
item.description:
Traffic diversion down Frogley Road is making it impossible to move parked cars/ commute in the morning. The traffic tails back the full length of the road, and the road is not wide enough to allow any traffic to flow against the stationary traffic. This is a hazard for emergency services attending residents here and causes access issues for residents using the disabled bays or with access needs for babies/ physical impairments/ the elderly. Please consider sharing the load with other streets/ using a wider street with more areas to pull in like North Cross Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Frogley Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recycle Clear Sack Not Collected, 25th July
item.description:
I understand that our house may be somewhat hidden from the main street and this might contribute to the inconsistency in collection. I kindly request that the recycling employees go a bit further in-depth and make sure they reach our house to collect the recycling materials regularly. I kindly request that this issue be addressed promptly, and I expect the recycling collection service to resume as scheduled without further delay.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Lessness Avenue, West Heath, Bexleyheath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Matress Fly tipping, 25th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Lessness Avenue, West Heath, Bexleyheath, London
